description: Prepares the DRAFT version of a flow so that it can be invoked. For more information, see Test a flow in Amazon Bedrock in the Amazon Bedrock User Guide.

parameters.name: flowIdentifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the flow.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the flow.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the flow. When you submit this request, the status will be NotPrepared. If preparation succeeds, the status becomes Prepared. If it fails, the status becomes FAILED.
